Player History
Drafted in 1st round, 10th overall pick, by Pittsburgh in 1975...
Had first career hit (double) on 4/15/1978, off Richard Neville (NJ)...
Hit first career homerun on 4/20/1978, off Daniel Frades (WIS)...
Won World Championship with Pittsburgh in 1978...
Won World Championship with Pittsburgh in 1981...
Had 5 hits with 6 RBI against Toledo on 6/2/1983...
Won Slick Fielder Award at Catcher in 1984...
Won World Championship with Pittsburgh in 1986...
Injured on 7/25/1987 with a Dislocated Shoulder, out for 3-4 weeks...
